explanation: The element defines the term 'Policy Number' used in the policy.
function: Identifies the unique identifier assigned to the insurance policy.

intent_analysis.intent_summary: Policy Number is a unique identifier assigned to a specific insurance policy.

intent_details.actor_obligations: Insurance company must assign a unique Policy Number to each policy issued.

conditions.effect: Coverage applies only if this policy number is specified
conditions.consequence: Coverage may not apply if the policy number is not TEST-12345

extracted_terms.context: Identifier assigned to the insurance policy
extracted_terms.significance: Key reference for the policy and its application

explanation: The element identifies the named insured, which is the entity or person covered by the insurance policy. (Corrected invalid type)
function: To specify the entity or person that is the primary insured party under the policy.

intent_analysis.intent_summary: This element identifies the named insured as ABC Corporation.

intent_details.temporal_conditions: Applies for the duration of the policy term
intent_details.actor_obligations: ABC Corporation must comply with all policy terms and conditions

conditions.effect: Coverage applies only to ABC Corporation
conditions.consequence: Coverage does not apply if named insured is not ABC Corporation

extracted_terms.context: Refers to ABC Corporation
extracted_terms.significance: Identifies the entity covered by the insurance policy

explanation: The element establishes the specific time period during which the policy is in effect, indicating the start and end dates.
function: Defines the duration of coverage provided by the insurance policy

intent_analysis.intent_summary: This element defines the time period during which the insurance policy is in effect.

intent_details.temporal_conditions: Coverage is only applicable between 01/01/2025 and 01/01/2026
intent_details.actor_obligations: Policyholder must ensure any claims or incidents fall within this time frame

conditions.effect: Defines the specific time period during which the policy is in effect
conditions.consequence: Coverage is only applicable between the specified dates

extracted_terms.significance: Defines the duration of coverage provided by the insurance policy

explanation: This element specifies a sub-limit of $1,000,000 for each occurrence within the broader coverage.
function: To establish the maximum amount the insurer will pay for each separate occurrence of a covered loss.

intent_analysis.intent_summary: This element sets the monetary limit of insurance coverage for each occurrence to $1,000,000.

conditions.effect: Limits the coverage to $1,000,000 per occurrence
conditions.consequence: Coverage is restricted to $1,000,000 for each separate occurrence

extracted_terms.context: Limits of Insurance
extracted_terms.significance: Specifies the maximum amount of coverage available for each occurrence

text: Section II – Who Is An Insured is amended to include as an additional insured the person(s) or organization(s) shown in the Schedule.
explanation: The element expands the coverage to include additional insured parties specified in the Schedule.
function: This element modifies Section II of the policy to extend coverage to additional insured parties listed in the Schedule.

intent_analysis.intent_summary: This element extends coverage to additional insured persons or organizations listed in the Schedule.

intent_details.what_is_covered: Additional insured persons or organizations listed in the Schedule
intent_details.temporal_conditions: Coverage applies as long as the additional insured status is in effect
intent_details.spatial_conditions: Coverage applies wherever the policy is valid
intent_details.actor_obligations: The insurer must provide coverage to the additional insured as specified in the policy

conditions.condition_text: the person(s) or organization(s) shown in the Schedule
conditions.effect: Expands coverage to include additional insured parties
conditions.applies_to: Section II – Who Is An Insured
conditions.consequence: Coverage applies only to those listed in the Schedule

extracted_terms.context: Refers to the individuals or organizations covered under the insurance policy
extracted_terms.significance: Determines the scope of coverage and who can benefit from the policy

extracted_terms.context: Refers to a person(s) or organization(s) added to the policy as insured parties
extracted_terms.significance: Expands the coverage to include additional parties beyond the original named insured

extracted_terms.context: Refers to a document attached to the policy listing specific additional insured parties
extracted_terms.significance: Specifies the individuals or organizations that are included as additional insured

normalized_text: Section II – Who Is An Insured is amended to include as an additional insured the person(s) or organization(s) shown in the Schedule.

unique_phrases: Section II – Who Is An Insured is amended to include as an additional insured the person(s) or organization(s) shown in the Schedule.

text: We will pay those sums that the insured becomes legally obligated to pay as damages because of 'bodily injury' or 'property damage' to which this insurance applies.
explanation: The element provides coverage for damages the insured becomes legally obligated to pay due to bodily injury or property damage.
function: Specifies the scope of coverage provided by the insurance policy in terms of liability for bodily injury or property damage.

intent_analysis.intent_summary: Promises to pay for covered damages or losses

conditions.condition_text: the insured becomes legally obligated to pay as damages because of 'bodily injury' or 'property damage' to which this insurance applies
conditions.effect: Coverage applies only if the insured becomes legally obligated to pay damages for bodily injury or property damage covered by this insurance
conditions.consequence: Coverage applies when the insured is legally obligated to pay for bodily injury or property damage

extracted_terms.context: damages because of 'bodily injury'
extracted_terms.significance: Defines a type of harm covered by the insurance

extracted_terms.context: damages because of 'property damage'
extracted_terms.significance: Defines a type of harm covered by the insurance

normalized_text: We will pay those sums that the insured becomes legally obligated to pay as damages because of 'bodily injury' or 'property damage' to which this insurance applies.

unique_phrases: We will pay those sums that the insured becomes legally obligated to pay as damages because of 'bodily injury' or 'property damage' to which this insurance applies.

text: We will have the right and duty to defend the insured against any 'suit' seeking those damages.
explanation: This element provides coverage by granting the insurer the right and duty to defend the insured in case of a 'suit' seeking damages.
function: To ensure that the insured is provided with legal defense in case of a lawsuit seeking damages.

intent_analysis.intent_summary: This element grants the insurance company the right and duty to defend the insured in any legal action seeking damages.

intent_details.what_is_covered: Legal defense costs for the insured in a lawsuit seeking damages
intent_details.actor_obligations: The insurance company has the obligation to defend the insured

conditions.condition_text: We will have the right and duty to defend the insured against any 'suit' seeking those damages.
conditions.effect: Requires the insurer to defend the insured in any lawsuit seeking damages
conditions.consequence: Coverage applies only if the insurer has the right and duty to defend

extracted_terms.context: used to specify the type of legal action that triggers the duty to defend
extracted_terms.significance: determines the specific circumstances under which the insurer must defend the insured

normalized_text: We will have the right and duty to defend the insured against any 'suit' seeking those damages.

unique_phrases: We will have the right and duty to defend the insured against any 'suit' seeking those damages.

text: However, we will have no duty to defend the insured against any 'suit' seeking damages for 'bodily injury' or 'property damage' to which this insurance does not apply.
explanation: This element explicitly states that the insurer has no duty to defend the insured in certain situations, which falls under the category of exclusions.
function: Excludes coverage for defending the insured in certain situations where the insurance does not apply

dependencies.explanation: The Exclusion element's application depends on the Coverage Grant element

intent_analysis.intent_summary: This element excludes the insurance company's duty to defend the insured in lawsuits seeking damages for bodily injury or property damage not covered by the insurance policy.

trigger_events: 'Suit' seeking damages for 'bodily injury' or 'property damage' not covered by the policy
intent_details.actor_obligations: The insurance company has no duty to defend the insured in such lawsuits.

conditions.effect: Removes coverage for 'bodily injury' or 'property damage'
conditions.applies_to: 'suit' seeking damages for 'bodily injury' or 'property damage'
conditions.consequence: No duty to defend the insured

extracted_terms.context: Any legal action seeking damages
extracted_terms.significance: Determines the scope of coverage based on the definition of 'suit'

extracted_terms.context: Physical harm to a person
extracted_terms.significance: Specifies the type of damages covered under the policy

extracted_terms.context: Physical damage to tangible property
extracted_terms.significance: Specifies the type of damages covered under the policy

extracted_terms.context: Refers to the specific insurance policy in question
extracted_terms.significance: Limits the scope of coverage to the policy terms

extracted_terms.context: Indicates when the duty to defend the insured does not exist
extracted_terms.significance: Excludes coverage for certain situations

normalized_text: However, we will have no duty to defend the insured against any 'suit' seeking damages for 'bodily injury' or 'property damage' to which this insurance does not apply.

unique_phrases: However, we will have no duty to defend the insured against any 'suit' seeking damages for 'bodily injury' or 'property damage' to which this insurance does not apply.

text:
Expected or Intended Injury
"Bodily injury" or "property damage" expected or intended from the standpoint of the insured.
explanation: The element explicitly removes coverage for bodily injury or property damage that is expected or intended by the insured.
function: To exclude coverage for intentional harm caused by the insured.

intent_analysis.intent_summary: This element excludes coverage for bodily injury or property damage that is expected or intended by the insured.

conditions.condition_text: "Bodily injury" or "property damage" expected or intended from the standpoint of the insured
conditions.effect: Removes coverage for bodily injury or property damage that is expected or intended by the insured
conditions.consequence: Coverage does not apply if bodily injury or property damage is expected or intended by the insured

extracted_terms.context: Bodily injury expected or intended from the standpoint of the insured.
extracted_terms.significance: Defines a type of harm that is excluded from coverage if expected or intended by the insured.

extracted_terms.context: Term appears in quotes, indicating it has a specific definition
extracted_terms.significance: Important for interpreting policy language

extracted_terms.context: Bodily injury or property damage expected or intended from the standpoint of the insured.
extracted_terms.significance: This term defines the scope of coverage exclusion based on the insured's intent or expectation.

extracted_terms.context: Property damage expected or intended from the standpoint of the insured.
extracted_terms.significance: Defines another type of harm that is excluded from coverage if expected or intended by the insured.

normalized_text:
Expected or Intended Injury
"Bodily injury" or "property damage" expected or intended from the standpoint of the insured.

unique_phrases:

text:
Contractual Liability
"Bodily injury" or "property damage" for which the insured is obligated to pay damages by reason of the assumption of liability in a contract or agreement.
explanation: The element explicitly removes coverage for bodily injury or property damage arising from assumed liability in a contract or agreement.
function: To exclude coverage for liabilities assumed by the insured under contracts or agreements.

intent_analysis.intent_summary: This element excludes coverage for bodily injury or property damage that the insured is obligated to pay damages for due to assuming liability in a contract or agreement.

trigger_events: Assumption of liability in a contract or agreement
intent_details.actor_obligations: The insured must not assume liability in a contract or agreement to avoid this exclusion.

conditions.condition_text: "Bodily injury" or "property damage" for which the insured is obligated to pay damages by reason of the assumption of liability in a contract or agreement
conditions.effect: Limits coverage for bodily injury or property damage arising from contractual liability
conditions.consequence: Coverage is excluded if the insured assumes liability in a contract or agreement

extracted_terms.context: Bodily injury or property damage for which the insured is obligated to pay damages by reason of the assumption of liability in a contract or agreement.
extracted_terms.significance: Specifies a type of harm covered under the exclusion.

extracted_terms.context: Term appears in quotes, indicating it has a specific definition
extracted_terms.significance: Important for interpreting policy language

extracted_terms.context: Bodily injury or property damage for which the insured is obligated to pay damages by reason of the assumption of liability in a contract or agreement.
extracted_terms.significance: Defines the type of liability covered under the exclusion.

extracted_terms.context: Bodily injury or property damage for which the insured is obligated to pay damages by reason of the assumption of liability in a contract or agreement.
extracted_terms.significance: Specifies another type of harm covered under the exclusion.

Contractual Liability
"Bodily injury" or "property damage" for which the insured is obligated to pay damages by reason of the assumption of liability in a contract or agreement.

text: "Bodily injury" means bodily injury, sickness or disease sustained by a person, including death resulting from any of these at any time.
explanation: The element provides a general definition of 'Bodily injury' within the policy.
function: To clarify the scope of bodily injury covered under the policy.

intent_analysis.intent_summary: Defines the term 'bodily injury' for interpreting policy coverage

intent_details.definition_impact: Influences interpretation of policy provisions using this term

conditions.condition_text: sickness or disease sustained by a person
conditions.effect: Restricts the scope of coverage to bodily injury, sickness, or disease sustained by a person
conditions.consequence: Coverage only applies to bodily injury, sickness, or disease sustained by a person

conditions.condition_text: death resulting from any of these at any time
conditions.effect: Restricts the scope of coverage to death resulting from bodily injury, sickness, or disease at any time
conditions.consequence: Coverage only applies to death resulting from bodily injury, sickness, or disease at any time

extracted_terms.context: means bodily injury, sickness or disease sustained by a person, including death resulting from any of these at any time
extracted_terms.significance: Defines the scope of bodily injury covered under the policy

extracted_terms.context: sickness or disease sustained by a person
extracted_terms.significance: Includes sickness as part of bodily injury definition

extracted_terms.context: sickness or disease sustained by a person
extracted_terms.significance: Includes disease as part of bodily injury definition

normalized_text: "Bodily injury" means bodily injury, sickness or disease sustained by a person, including death resulting from any of these at any time.

unique_phrases: "Bodily injury" means bodily injury, sickness or disease sustained by a person, including death resulting from any of these at any time.

text:
"Property damage" means:
a. Physical injury to tangible property, including all resulting loss of use of that property; or
b. Loss of use of tangible property that is not physically injured.
explanation: The element 'Property damage' is clearly defining the term for the purposes of the insurance policy.
function: To establish the meaning of 'Property damage' within the context of the policy.

intent_analysis.intent_summary: This element defines 'property damage' as physical injury to tangible property or loss of use of tangible property that is not physically injured.

intent_details.what_is_covered: Physical injury to tangible property or loss of use of tangible property

conditions.condition_text: Physical injury to tangible property, including all resulting loss of use of that property
conditions.effect: Limits coverage to cases of physical injury to tangible property
conditions.consequence: Coverage applies only if there is physical injury to tangible property

conditions.condition_text: Loss of use of tangible property that is not physically injured
conditions.effect: Expands coverage to include loss of use of tangible property that is not physically injured
conditions.consequence: Coverage applies to loss of use of tangible property even if not physically injured

extracted_terms.context: means: a. Physical injury to tangible property, including all resulting loss of use of that property; or b. Loss of use of tangible property that is not physically injured.
extracted_terms.significance: Defines the scope of what is considered property damage for the purposes of the insurance policy.

extracted_terms.context: a. Physical injury to tangible property, including all resulting loss of use of that property
extracted_terms.significance: Specifies one of the conditions that constitute property damage.

extracted_terms.term: Loss of use of tangible property
extracted_terms.context: b. Loss of use of tangible property that is not physically injured
extracted_terms.significance: Specifies another condition that constitutes property damage.

normalized_text:
"Property damage" means:
a. Physical injury to tangible property, including all resulting loss of use of that property; or
b. Loss of use of tangible property that is not physically injured.

text: Bankruptcy or insolvency of the insured or of the insured's estate will not relieve us of our obligations under this policy.
explanation: This element establishes a condition that the bankruptcy or insolvency of the insured or their estate will not relieve the insurer of their obligations under the policy.
function: Ensures that the insurer remains obligated to fulfill the terms of the policy even in the event of the insured's bankruptcy or insolvency.

intent_analysis.intent_summary: This element ensures that the insurance company's obligations under the policy will not be relieved in the event of the insured or the insured's estate declaring bankruptcy or insolvency.

intent_details.what_is_covered: Obligations of the insurance company under the policy
intent_details.temporal_conditions: At any time during the policy period

conditions.condition_text: Bankruptcy or insolvency of the insured or of the insured's estate
conditions.effect: Removes coverage in case of bankruptcy or insolvency
conditions.applies_to: The insured or the insured's estate
conditions.consequence: Will not relieve the insurer of their obligations under the policy

extracted_terms.context: of the insured or of the insured's estate
extracted_terms.significance: This condition specifies that the bankruptcy or insolvency of the insured or their estate will not relieve the insurer of their obligations under the policy.

normalized_text: Bankruptcy or insolvency of the insured or of the insured's estate will not relieve us of our obligations under this policy.

unique_phrases: Bankruptcy or insolvency of the insured or of the insured's estate will not relieve us of our obligations under this policy.

text: You must see to it that we are notified as soon as practicable of an 'occurrence' or an offense which may result in a claim.

conditions: You must see to it that we are notified as soon as practicable of an 'occurrence' or an offense which may result in a claim.

explanation: This element establishes a requirement for the insured to notify the insurer of an 'occurrence' or offense that may result in a claim.
function: To ensure timely reporting of potential claims to the insurer.

intent_analysis.intent_summary: Policyholder must notify the insurer promptly of any potential claim arising from an occurrence or offense.

conditions.condition_text: You must see to it that we are notified as soon as practicable of an 'occurrence' or an offense which may result in a claim.
conditions.consequence: Coverage may be denied if not reported promptly

extracted_terms.context: an 'occurrence'
extracted_terms.significance: This term defines the event that triggers the notification requirement

extracted_terms.context: an offense
extracted_terms.significance: Another type of event that triggers the notification requirement

extracted_terms.context: may result in a claim
extracted_terms.significance: The potential outcome of the 'occurrence' or offense

extracted_terms.context: we are notified as soon as practicable
extracted_terms.significance: Requirement for timely notification to the insurance company

normalized_text: You must see to it that we are notified as soon as practicable of an 'occurrence' or an offense which may result in a claim.
